amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Secretary of Education from using social security numbers as the personal identifier for student loan applicants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 3 in the Congressional Record of April 28, 1998, to prohibit the Secretary of Education from using social security numbers as the personal identifier for student loan applicants.
